body: Iv'e Always wondered, why is the server called Avicus?

title: Avicus name

replies.body: Because it sounds cool, which is why pretty much everything is called what it is.

replies.body: Isn't avicus some mythological god or something like that?

replies.body:
Sorry, I posted a comment here that was supposed to be on another thread.

Anyways, I like the word "Avicus" and many other people do too. It just sounds cool xP
